thread.section_title: The Shower Doctor Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of showerdoc.com | 17 of 1022
thread.title: Rod
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Rod

author: Rod
title: Rod
text: I have used "The Shower Doctor" several times before in trying to identify spares for shower valves that my Customers have bought (usually cheap!) themselves, which have failed early, have no recognizable branding and then they ask me to replace the failed part. The care and persistence that "Shower Doctor" give to identifying the spare parts amounts to nothing short of brilliant customer service. Thank you so much.
